snippet: Three years of drought have Californians debating an end to the state's status as one of the last in the West with a pump-as-you-please policy for the vital underground sources that provide up to 65 percent of the state's water....

headline.print_headline: Drought Has State Debating Its Unregulated Pumping
headline.main: Drought Has State Debating Its Unregulated Pumping

lead_paragraph: Three years of drought have Californians debating an end to the state's status as one of the last in the West with a pump-as-you-please policy for the vital underground sources that provide up to 65 percent of the state's water.
